sentence: Some Democrats were alarmed that Douglas Mastriano, who has repeatedly raised debunked claims of election fraud and was present at the Jan. 6 insurrection at the U.S. Capitol, won the Republican nomination for governor in Pennsylvania Tuesday.
author: Alexander Bolton
title: Klobuchar, Warren introduce bill to provide $20 billion for election administration

sentence: Trumps backing appeared to turbocharge the campaign of Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate Douglas Mastriano, who spread discredited claims of widespread election fraud in the 2020 election and attended the Jan. 6 protests outside the Capitol.
title: GOP lawmakers say primaries show Trumps firm grip on party
